channel.title: Netlify on Lightbi
channel.description: Recent content in Netlify on Lightbi

item.title: Host in Netlify
item.description: You can host your static website wth zero cost in Netlify. Add the below netlify.toml in the root folder. [build] publish = "public" command = "hugo --gc --minify" [context.production.environment] HUGO_VERSION = "0.
